This story made me cry. Her father's reaction is heartbreaking and to see the thief's reaction as he shrugged it off? What a loser of a person this man is for stealing from a baby and have no remorse for doing it.

Speaking of people who just want to see their name in a topic how bout you stop spewing hatred to something you don't get. Do you what it's like to be a public servant?! To go to work everyday hoping to God when they call 911 they actually need help and aren't setting you up. To work on an ambulance, completely unarmed I add, and knock on a door to help a total stranger. Or to be a police officer and answer a calm to defend or protect people you've never met? If you don't know what it's like to be a public servant, furthermore a police officer, shut up and stop telling them how to do there jobs. I am not saying their all perfect but then again no one is. So I'll reiterate my previous statement. If you have nothing more intelligent to say than """"that's what you get"""" in support of a man who killed 5 cops who had NOTHING to do with previous cop vs civilian situations than shut your ignorant mouth and stop spewing senseless hatred. You talk about uniting, but then you spew moronic, counterproductive, and misplaced anger and hatred. Before you can help unite anyone you first need to step back and think before you type next time

Trump says and does anything to get attention. Anyone who studies this guy knows that this was his plan years ago and he even talked about how to dominate the media. So he is constantly in the news and the other candidates are forced to talk about him a lot...so it sucks the air out of their ability to get a reasonable share of airtime....and when they do get it often they are on the defense. It is absolutely brilliant strategy...his actual reality TV experience preped him nicely for this. Only this time it is NOT reality TV...it is the Presidency of the US...not a game...not """"Your Fired""""...or who gets """"Kicked off the Island"""".

I have been unable to complete this post, but the gist is for me Hillary cannot answer to diverse groups. One group with one agenda. Than the media covers content to keep the next group blind. Many of her base are in conflict with one another and an open forum would be detrimental to her campaign. Her campaign is now in trouble as her numbers drop and sanders rise if Bernie goes for the jugular she will bleed like a stuck hog. Her campaign is deception, and Bernie, and trump could bring this out as they are both on the inside.
